title: pixel 3 restarting itself after when I take a few photos continuously.Tried safe mode, factory reset
content:
Hi guys,
My pixel 3 just starts restarting itself after when I take a few photos continuously in Google Camera app. I tried removing camera updates. I tried safe mode. I tried factory reset. After factory reset, before installing any other app, i tried using camera app before and after updating the app. Phone just Restarts by itself after a few snaps. Then it just keep restarting by itself, and sometimes automatically in safe mode or in aeroplane mode!

Guys.....help....
